titles.title: 3D Reference Organ for Brain, Male v1.1

descriptions.description: This reference organ was adapted from data from the "Allen Human Reference Atlas – 3D, 2020" representing one half of the human brain (Ding et al., 2016). The 141 anatomical structures were mirrored to arrive at a whole human brain (as intended) and resized to fit the Visible Human Project Male and Female bodies.

alternateIdentifiers.alternateIdentifier: Browne, Kristen, Leonard E. Cross, Bruce W. Herr II, Lisel Record, Ellen Quardokus, Andreas Bueckle, Katy Börner. 2021. HuBMAP CCF 3D Reference Object Library.https://hubmapconsortium.github.io/ccf/pages/ccf-3d-reference-library.html. Accessed on December 1, 2021.
